ProjectTitle: The EU’s Recovery Plan and the Constitutional System of the European Union – Between Rupture and Continuity
AllFeedback:
14/07/2022 Since your fellowship is postponed till September 2023, there are 2 options for the DMP (as FWO does not move the deadline for DMP submission): 1. you do submit a DMP now using the FWO template and we can report to FWO that this has been received (info and template here https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp) 2. you submit a DMP when the fellowship actually starts (you may continue to receive reminders from this platform that your DMP is overdue, but can ignore those) 0
Since your fellowship is postponed till September 2023, there are 2 options for the DMP (as FWO does not move the deadline for DMP submission): 1. you do submit a DMP now using the FWO template and we can report to FWO that this has been received (info and template here https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp) 2. you submit a DMP when the fellowship actually starts (you may continue to receive reminders from this platform that your DMP is overdue, but can ignore those)
